parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Employ guards to control {{ pe-3.3_prm_1 }} to the facility where the system resides 24 hours per day, 7 days per week.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Employing guards at selected physical access points to the facility provides a more rapid response capability for organizations. Guards also provide the opportunity for human surveillance in areas of the facility not covered by video surveillance.
